https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anatomi._instruction: Add the axes orientation denoted in standard anatomical terms of direction (stated as XYZ) for the anatomical space of this custom coordinate framework.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anatomi.description: Relation between reference planes used in anatomy and mathematics.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anatomi.label: Anatomical axes orientation
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anatomi.name: anatomicalAxesOrientation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/axesOri._instruction: Enter the coordinate point in the native anatomical space of the template as [x, y] or [x, y, z] for two- or three-dimensional spaces, respectively, that has been defined as the origin of the anatomical space of this custom coordinate framework (i.e., as the central point where all axes intersect).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/axesOri.description: Special point in a coordinate system used as a fixed point of reference for the geometry of the surrounding space.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/axesOri.label: Axes origin
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/axesOri.name: axesOrigin

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/default._instruction: Add all image files used as visual representation of this custom coordinate framework.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/default.description: Two or three dimensional image that particluarly represents a specific coordinate space.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/default.label: Default image
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/default.name: defaultImage

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this custom coordinate framework.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/nativeU._instruction: Add the native unit that is used for this custom coordinate framework.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/nativeU.description: Determinate quantity used in the original measurement.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/nativeU.label: Native unit
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/nativeU.name: nativeUnit
